instruction:
Alright, here is a question for you. Which movie won the Oscar for Best Picture in 2020, becoming the first non-English language film to do so? It is a South Korean black comedy thriller directed by Bong Joon-ho.

A) Parasite B) Joker C) 1917 D) Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

Choose the correct answer.
combined_input:
Alright, here is a question for you. Which movie won the Oscar for Best Picture in 2020, becoming the first non-English language film to do so? It is a South Korean black comedy thriller directed by Bong Joon-ho.

A) Parasite B) Joker C) 1917 D) Once Upon a Time in Hollywood

Choose the correct answer. rMar forgot Spanish BothResource
generated_output:
: https://www.buzzfeed.com/annaboltz/the-11-best-english-language-films-of-2020-according-to?fbclid=IwAR2bDk74FwZ0C-bvKlUeZZhT

### Part 12

Q1 You have been assigned for the role of director for a popular movie. After having numerous meetings with all the major actors in the movie, you decide to call a meeting of all the creative members of the movie. While doing so, you realise that not all of them are a part of that particular studio, but have been hired via recruiting agencies.

You: Hey, everyone! Please take your seats. As you all know it is essential for every film to be a success. Therefore, I am here to get you all together and to discuss how we can do it with everyone's support.

R: As you know, I am here to share the technical inputs to have a better movie. Afterall, the story should be great, but without the support of the technical side, it is a nightmare for the maker.

R2: I am here to discuss the actors’ roles and I know my role is the most important, but I can't do it without your support and the help you all need to give me.

B1, B2 and B3: Hehe, you are very funny guys. As you all know, our team is huge and we cannot make out anything without the support of everyone to create a whole story.

C: I'll be a bit difficult to manage this huge team.

D: I agree with C, but also, I do have a point, let's just sit together and discuss.

T: I am sure it is my job and my duty to keep everything organised, but I can't do it without your help.

K: Yeah, I am the writer of this movie and even I have to say that the story is so great that I won't be able to handle it alone.

E: We have been working as a team for so long, so let's just keep our egos aside and work like a family.

Q2 The same group of people meet in the studio again and everyone is busy as usual. However, one of the crew members asks you to bring him down to basement to show him something.

Crew member: Hey, what are you all doing here?

R: Hey, it is nothing. We are preparing some important stuff for the movie.

A: Yes, there is a lot to be done. We have a huge task of bringing the story alive.

B: There is a lot to take care of everything, from the cast selection to organising a huge set.

F: Yeah, it is a lot of work to do in the entire studio.

T: We are all a team and we should come together to be able to do it.

C: I agree, as long as everyone comes together, I am sure, we can do it.

D: Don't say that, as we all know that it not a single person working for it. It is everyone working together.

E: I completely understand that it is the cooperation which is essential to deliver, but we are all people and it takes a lot of energy to be together.

Q3 You are the producer of the movie and are asked to address the media.

You: As you know that we are filming a movie, and I am sure it will be a huge hit as we have put in a lot of effort into it.

A: All I know is that it is a beautiful love story and there is a lot of hard work.

B: Oh, yes, there is a lot of hard work, but it’s all worth it.

T: It is the first movie of our team and we will do our best to be able to achieve something.

A: Yeah, I agree with you, and I am sure we will be able to give an outstanding movie.

Q4 You are again called for a press interview and your main rival has just started to interview you.

R: Hello again! I am really excited for your movie and want to see it from the sets to the last scene. However, as you know, they do a lot of work in the background, is it all done?

R2: Let me ask you this, what do you think about my idea?

R3: As you know, it is all about the story, but yes, there are some technical stuff which is also essential.

R4: I think it is a hard work and all of it is important.

A: Yes, there are a lot of things to do in it, but the actor or actress has to remember everything.

A2: There are a lot of rules that you have to follow.

T: It is all about the work, we can't work alone and need to be able to support each other.

B: We are a huge team and we do everything together and that is the reason for our success.

B2: I am pretty sure that you will be able to do it, as we all work together and do everything as a team.

B3: It is such a beautiful concept and I am pretty sure people will love the movie.

Q5 You are back to the set as everyone is preparing to shoot your final scene.

A: Hey, I am tired and need to sit somewhere.

R: It is hard to work in the movie.

T: I couldn't concentrate when I was shooting that final scene.

B: It is hard to see everything happening so fast.

B2: I can't see anything, please open the window.

T: I felt nauseous after that.

R2: It has been a long day.

T: I am feeling a lot of pressure.

F: Oh, please let me sit.

D: I don't want to watch it, it is making me nervous.

E: The hard work is not even finished, but we are shooting the scene.

Q6 You are sitting in a car and your friend has joined you and starts to discuss the movie with you.

T: I agree, as it will be a great movie and we can do it.

E: Yeah, I knew we could do it.

F: I agree.

B: It is about being able to cooperate with another person.

Q7 After a lot of the scenes of the movie has been shot and most of the actors have left the set, it is late night and they are cleaning up the set.

A: I think we should do something about the actors as we don't know how to take care of everyone.

A2: I think it is tough to do by one person and we must have a good team.

B: Oh, yes I agree with you.

T: I can't see anything we are leaving.

D: We are a big team, so we all need to do our job and be able to support each other.

Q8 You are going to attend a TV show where you are supposed to speak about your movie.
Your teammates are talking amongst themselves.

T: I heard you were looking up to Aamir.

C: Yeah, you are right, but he is a great person, and I can trust him with everything.

A: Let me ask you this, what do you think about my idea?

T: He is an excellent actor and I have no problems trusting him.

R: I can't see anyone other than Aamir for the lead role.

T: He is such a brilliant actor and also a good co-worker.

F: I am here to discuss some issues regarding the camera and how I can manage it.

D: He is such a generous hearted guy who is always there to help everyone without thinking of it.

T: He is also the most hard working as we can see from his work.

Q9 You are in the middle of the scene being shot and someone is taking your photo.

A: It is such a beautiful movie and I hope the audience likes it.

D: Oh, I completely understand and I am sure we can all make a great movie together.

K: I think it will be a success.

F: It is our responsibility to take great care of everyone.

K: I think we can do it as a team and support each other.

T: I can agree with you on that.

C: I think it has to be done with everyone’s support and we should be able to achieve something, I am sure we can.

B: I can agree with everyone that it is a great move taken to work in together with a lot of support.

B2: I think that there is a lot to be done.

P: Let me introduce my team. It consists of everyone in this industry. We are a team made of different members and I am sure we can achieve something together.

Q: It is a beautiful movie and I think I will agree to work with you.

Q10 You are talking to the camera and it is not a movie. It is your final project in your cinema class.
You are being asked to discuss the movie. It has been made by a large team.

You: I think we can all get together and create a great movie.

A: I think you have made a perfect decision.

D: I think it will be a great movie and you should work hard to make it.

T: There is such a beautiful scene I wish someone had shot it for me.

K: I couldn't see how he did it, it is amazing work.

B: I liked his movie a lot and I wish he would do another one with me.

B2: I also liked it a lot and I think it has to be a team effort.

E: I agreed with that you can always work on it, but don't expect anything and it should be from the heart.

R: I think we should support each other.

R2: I don't know what I would prefer. I would like to have a team effort and have everyone working together, so that the final movie can be a success.

P: I wish I could be a part of it as I found this industry a lot of hard work and everyone involved in it is so talented.

Q11 You are once again interviewed, and it is your last time doing a press conference in this film.

You: The best part about the movie is the fact that everyone is involved in the making of the film and everyone is making a little contribution to the final film.

A: I think that you are making such a good movie and I hope you will win the Oscar like the last ones did.

T: Don’t be too overconfident and think you will win the Oscar as it is not true. It has been such a hard journey to get an Oscar.

A2: There will be a lot of hard work until you make something.

D: I agree with you and I think that is the reason why the last Oscar has been a huge hit.

T: I think it will be hard to achieve something, but if we all work together, it will all come true.

B: There will be a lot to do when you make the film, but I think if you spend your time with the right people and work towards achieving something, it will all be worth it.

B2: I love that you are making this movie, it is a perfect idea and I think you should get an Oscar for this.

Q12 It is the last day of your film and it has been a big journey in the movie.

T: I think it’s a lot of responsibility now.

Q: It is a perfect start and I am quite sure we can achieve something together.

P: I hope we achieve something.

R: I agree with all of you.

C: Yeah, we don’t have an audience, but I don’t care, as I know we can make something really great together.

F: Oh, yes, it is a big responsibility to work with your team.

T: As you know, we have a lot to do and I am sure we can do it together.

Q: It is our final day and I cannot believe it has been such an amazing journey for us.

A: I feel excited but it will be a lot of work.

K: We are a team and we should support one and another.

R: I think it has taken quite some time for us to get here and I do think we will have a great achievement.

C: I think it will be an amazing achievement and there will be a lot of fun involved.

Q: I can be pretty sure that we will get great results together.
